alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:22PM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River continues to slowly fall at New Harmony and will fall below flood stage early this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CST Sunday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 8.3 feet Wednesday, January 19. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
